content: "Isis Unveiled" is a song by the Swedish symphonic metal band Therion, which was released on their 1995 album "Lepaca Kliffoth". The song is inspired by the ancient Egyptian goddess Isis, who was revered as a powerful symbol of femininity, magic, and protection. The lyrics of the song refer to various aspects of Egyptian mythology and mysticism, and the music features powerful symphonic arrangements and dynamic vocal performances. "Isis Unveiled" is considered to be one of the standout tracks on "Lepaca Kliffoth" and is a fan favorite among Therion's discography.
